医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
九州大学团队开发出对抗年龄相关肌肉萎缩的抗体我们都老了。尽管人类的预期寿命在现代显着增加，但随着年龄的增长，我们的身体仍然面临着不可避免的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/九州大学-team-develops-antibody-to-fight-age-lated-muscle-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/九州大学-team-develops-antibody-to-fight-age-lated-muscle-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8e02232-226e-49c0-8078-643a94c41395 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:14:00 -0500 Kyushu University team develops antibody to fight age-related muscle atrophy
糖尿病药物可将哮喘发作率降低高达 70%，重塑治疗方案二甲双胍和 GLP-1 受体激动剂可显着减少 2 型糖尿病患者的哮喘发作，为哮喘提供潜在的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diabetes-drugs-cut-asthma-attacks-by-up-to-7025-reshaping-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diabetes-drugs-cut-asthma-attacks-by-up-to-7025-reshaping-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94199b58-d313-4f5d-bb72-8bcf3c7e8f4c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 23:00:00 -0500 Diabetes drugs cut asthma attacks by up to 70%, reshaping treatment options
多走路，活得更久：新研究揭示了体力活动的延长寿命的力量增加体力活动，即使是适度的活动，也可以显着延长预期寿命，其中在 40 岁及以上最不活跃的人群中观察到的益处最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Walk-more-live-longer-New-study-reveals-the-life-extending-power-of-physical-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Walk-more-live-longer-New-study-reveals-the-life-extending-power-of-physical-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08699f5f-c7ed-4d6a-bfe7-221200eeb80b Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:35:00 -0500 Walk more, live longer: New study reveals the life-extending power of physical activity
互联网的使用促进了全球老年人的心理健康23 个国家/地区使用互联网的老年人心理健康得到改善，包括抑郁症状减少和生活满意度提高，其益处因人口和遗传因素而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Internet-use-boosts-mental-health-for-older-adults-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Internet-use-boosts-mental-health-for-older-adults-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5561d30-2350-4fb6-8a6a-ad823b522313 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:16:00 -0500 Internet use boosts mental health for older adults worldwide
放射学中的人工智能解释可能导致过度依赖根据美国放射学会杂志《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，在做出诊断决定时，放射科医生和其他医生可能会过度依赖人工智能 (AI)，因为它会指出 X 射线中感兴趣的特定区域。北美（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/AI-explanations-in-radiology-can-lead-to-over-reliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/AI-explanations-in-radiology-can-lead-to-over-reliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ec6ca98-5bcd-4b6f-8aa1-014cef179e05 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 22:12:00 -0500 AI explanations in radiology can lead to over-reliance
新的蛋白质靶标有望缓解帕金森病的认知能力下降亚利桑那大学健康科学中心的研究人员最近发表的一项研究发现，一种名为 PNA5 的微小蛋白质似乎对脑细胞具有保护作用，这可能有助于治疗帕金森病和相关疾病的认知症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New- Protein-target-offers-promise-for-allevating-cognitive-decline-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New- Protein-target-offers-promise-for-allevating-cognitive-decline-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e26415d5-3294-4921-83a2-a63822409a60 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 21:57:13 -0500 New protein target offers promise for alleviating cognitive decline in Parkinson's disease
Muvalaplin 在临床试验中显示出降低 Lp(a) 水平的前景根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上公布的最新科学成果，一项测试 Muvalaplin（一种新型口服药物）的临床试验能够安全有效地降低高水平的脂蛋白 (a)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Muvalaplin-shows-promise-in-lowering-Lp(a)-levels-in-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Muvalaplin-shows-promise-in-lowering-Lp(a)-levels-in-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e314efad-27b8-4ea6-bfaa-fcf95345ef27 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 20:16:33 -0500 Muvalaplin shows promise in lowering Lp(a) levels in clinical trial
低剂量氯胺酮可能是吗啡治疗急性疼痛的有效辅助镇痛药一项研究低剂量氯胺酮 (LDK) 作为吗啡辅助治疗急性疼痛的新研究已发表在学术紧急医学学会 (SAEM) 同行评审期刊《学术紧急医学》 (AEM) 十月号上）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Low-dose-ketamine-may-be-an- effective-adjunct-analgesic-to-morphine-for-managing-acute-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Low-dose-ketamine-may-be-an- effective-adjunct-analgesic-to-morphine-for-managing-acute-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5adee19-e8a9-480b-a62d-1869cf4122ff Tue, 19 Nov 2024 19:55:27 -0500 Low-dose ketamine may be an effective adjunct analgesic to morphine for managing acute pain
常见心血管药物可降低痴呆风险卡罗林斯卡学院在《阿尔茨海默病与痴呆：阿尔茨海默病协会杂志》上发表的一项新研究表明，常见的心血管药物可降低老年痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Common-cardioangio-drugs-linked-to-lower-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Common-cardioangio-drugs-linked-to-lower-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cae3eaa3-79a4-4588-8693-9bb4fa6ff823 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 19:52:22 -0500 Common cardiovascular drugs linked to lower risk of dementia
世卫组织授予 LC16m8 MPOX 疫苗紧急使用清单世界卫生组织 (WHO) 已授予 LC16m8 mpox 疫苗紧急使用清单 (EUL)，使其成为继总干事宣布国际关注的 MPOX 突发公共卫生事件 (PHEIC) 后，世卫组织支持的第二种 MPOX 疫苗2024 年 8 月 14 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/WHO-grants-Emergency-Use-Listing-for-LC16m8-mpox-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/WHO-grants-Emergency-Use-Listing-for-LC16m8-mpox-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51ef4dcb-3876-4e8a-8143-76278eeedd0a Tue, 19 Nov 2024 19:40:19 -0500 WHO grants Emergency Use Listing for LC16m8 mpox vaccine
